xinstall.name: Menu
xinstall.description: Displays available languages for the website.

param.name: css_name
param.label: CSS postfix
param.description: A value that will be added to all default class / id values for module identification.

param.name: menu_id
param.label: Menu
param.description: The menu this module will display.

param.name: show_type
param.label: Display type
param.description: Defines the way the imager should be displayed.

param.name: parent_id
param.label: Parent id
param.description: The parent id of the submenu.

param.name: level_start
param.label: Starting level
param.description: The starting depth of the menu.

param.name: level_end
param.label: Ending level
param.description: The ending depth of the menu.

param.name: separator_style
param.label: Separator style
param.description: Defines wether the menu should be displayed with separators.

param.name: separator
param.label: Separator
param.description: The separator that will be used.
